name: Night Shift (itch) (1StupidRat - Toxic Sasquatch)
description:
In Night Shift, you play as "J", a delusional Janitor whose office comes to life in his imagination.  Sweep the halls or something.  Defeat evil.  Save the world.  Or not.  We don't know.

Search through the randomly generated maps to find the Copier Demon that's animated the entire office and set it against you!  Collect coffee to increase your speed and upgrade your mop, the Janitor's best friend.

& Friends

Team:

Programming:  Brendan Larson, Jake Anderson, Rory Tisdel, Kayleigh Callaway

SFX:  Brendan Larson, Rory Tisdel

Character Art: Joshua Haakana, Tim Schultz, Emily Wegner

Environment Art: Douglas Gafner, Tim Schultz

Graphic Design: Douglas Gafner, Joshua Haakana, Brendan Larson

Level Design: Jake Anderson , Kayleigh Callaway, Brendan Larson, Rory Tisdel
